hibernate-mapping.query: update GLMORM00023 as l set l.Opening_bal = :Opening_bal, l.Closing_bal = :Closing_bal, l.Credit_Amount = :Credit_Amount, l.Debit_Amount = :Debit_Amount, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.DCode = :DCode and l.SUBITEM = :SUBITEM and l.ITEM = :ITEM and l.Active = true
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ACode,ACName,ACType TYPE,subString(ACode,1,3)+'000' HACode from COA Where ACode=:ACode and Active=1 and subString(ACode,1,3)+'000' in(select ACode from COA)

select SUBITEM ACode,subString(SUBITEM,1,3)+'000' HACode,COA.ACName,TITLE,SUBTITLE,OtherBankGroupTitle,TYPE from Monthly_COA, COA Where Monthly_COA.SUBITEM=COA.ACode and Monthly_COA.SUBITEM=:ACode and Monthly_COA.Active=1 and subString(SUBITEM,1,3)+'000' in(select ACode from COA)
select 'All' BranchCode union all select BranchCode from branch
select * from ( select distinct cast(ITEM as int)SrNo,TITLE ,(select Max(cast(ITEM as int))+1 from Monthly_COA) MaxSrNo from Monthly_COA )a order by SrNo
select distinct TITLE,cast(ITEM as int) SrNo,cast(ITEM as int) NewSrNo,(select COUNT(distinct(ITEM)) from Monthly_COA Where Type=:Type) MaxSrNo from Monthly_COA Where Type=:Type order by SrNo

select distinct SUBTITLE,ITEM,SUBITEM_No,SUBITEM_No NewSubSrNo,(select COUNT(cast(SUBITEM_No as int)) from Monthly_COA Where TITLE=:TITLE) MaxSubSrNo from Monthly_COA Where TITLE=:TITLE order by SUBITEM_No,SUBTITLE
select distinct ACODE,OtherBankGroupTitle from Monthly_COA coa Where substring(ACode, 1,3)='AAC' and substring(ACode, 1,3)=substring(:ACode, 1,3) order by coa.OtherBankGroupTitle

Insert into Monthly_COA (ACODE,SUBITEM ,TYPE,TITLE,SUBTITLE ,ITEM ,Opening_bal,Closing_bal,Credit_Amount ,Debit_Amount ,DCode, Active,OtherBankGroupTitle, CreatedDate,CreatedUserId,SUBITEM_No) select :ACODE,:SUBITEM ,:TYPE,:TITLE,:SUBTITLE ,:ITEM ,:Opening_bal,:Closing_bal,:Credit_Amount ,:Debit_Amount ,:DCode, :Active,:OtherBankGroupTitle,:CreatedDate,:CreatedUserId,:SUBITEM_No

update Monthly_COA set TITLE = :TITLE, SUBTITLE = :SUBTITLE, ITEM = :ITEM, SUBITEM_No = :SUBITEM_No, OtherBankGroupTitle = :OtherBankGroupTitle, UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where DCode = :DCode
and SUBITEM = :SUBITEM and TYPE = :TYPE and Active = :Active
update Monthly_COA set ITEM = :ITEM, UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where DCode = :DCode and TYPE = :TYPE and TITLE = :TITLE and Active = :Active

update Monthly_COA set SUBITEM_No = :SUBITEM_No, UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where DCode = :DCode and TYPE = :TYPE and TITLE = :TITLE and SUBTITLE = :SUBTITLE and Active = :Active

Delete from Monthly_COA Where SUBITEM = :SUBITEM and TYPE = :TYPE and TITLE = :TITLE and SUBTITLE = :SUBTITLE and ITEM = :ITEM and
DCode = :DCode
